name: Game01
description:
Instructions:

Right click to open craft system and left click to arrange 0 and 1 inside your package to form some useful tools. Left click to use your tool.

How many times have you felt LOST in the world with massive data and information. However we can FOUND numerous happiness from these virtual worlds built upon zeros and ones where we are free from the constraints of reality.

Game 01 is a place that let you investigate your imagination, build tools like bombs and shovels with simple 0 and 1 to proceed through each level.  You LOST those resources in the world but what you FOUND is a moment of fun and imagination.
